image-annotation-services.desc: Expert labeling from bounding boxes to segmentation, delivering high-precision data for accurate computer vision models.

services.title: 2D Bounding Box Image Annotation
services.desc: Bounding box image annotation for object detection and classification. Enables precise localization, occlusion handling, and consistent labeling across large-scale image datasets for computer vision models.

services.title: Semantic Segmentation Image Annotation
services.desc: Pixel-level image annotation using semantic segmentation. Delivers accurate object boundaries and scene understanding for medical imaging, autonomous navigation, and safety-critical computer vision applications.

services.title: 3D Cuboid Image Annotation
services.desc: 3D cuboid image annotation for depth-aware perception. Labels objects across spatial dimensions to support robotics, autonomous vehicles, and computer vision systems requiring three-dimensional context.

services.title: Polygon and Polyline Image Annotation
services.desc: Polygon and polyline image annotation for complex shapes and irregular objects. Captures fine-grained contours, road edges, and structural boundaries beyond standard bounding boxes.

services.title: Keypoint and Landmark Image Annotation
services.desc: Keypoint and landmark image annotation for pose estimation and feature detection. Identifies skeletal joints, facial landmarks, and structural points for motion analysis and biometric AI models.

multimodal-annotation-services.desc: Synchronizing vision, language, and sensor data to power context-aware Foundation Models and Embodied AI.

services.title: Multimodal ImageText Annotation (VisionLanguage)
services.desc: Image annotation aligned with text labeling to train vision-language models. Supports visual grounding, OCR mapping, and instruction tuning for Generative AI and computer vision systems.

services.title: Multimodal AudioText Annotation
services.desc: Text and audio annotation synchronized for speech understanding. Includes transcription, sentiment labeling, and multilingual NLP annotation to power voice assistants and conversational AI platforms.

services.title: Multimodal VideoAudio Annotation
services.desc: Video annotation synchronized with audio streams for temporal accuracy. Enables object tracking, event tagging, and behavioral analysis across frames for surveillance, media intelligence, and safety AI.

services.title: Sensor Fusion and 3D Point Cloud Annotation
services.desc: LiDAR and image annotation combined with sensor fusion. Aligns 2D camera data with 3D point clouds for depth perception in autonomous vehicles, robotics, and industrial automation.

services.title: Multimodal Entity and Event Annotation
services.desc: Cross-modal entity annotation linking objects, actions, and events across image, video, text, and audio datasets. Ensures consistent identity resolution for advanced reasoning and AI perception models.

text-annotation-services.desc: Structured text annotation services delivering accurate, scalable NLP training data for enterprise and production-ready AI models.

services.title: Text Categorization and Classification
services.desc: Text annotation for document classification and content categorization. Enables topic labeling, hierarchical taxonomies, spam detection, and language identification for scalable NLP and enterprise content systems.

services.title: Named Entity Recognition (NER)
services.desc: NER text annotation for extracting entities such as names, locations, organizations, dates, and domain-specific terms. Structures unstructured text for search, analytics, and intelligent automation.

services.title: Sentiment Analysis Annotation
services.desc: Sentiment annotation to classify emotional tone and opinion in text. Supports polarity detection, emotion tagging, sarcasm handling, and multilingual sentiment analysis for customer intelligence and NLP models.

services.title: Intent Classification Annotation
services.desc: Intent labeling for conversational AI and chatbots. Categorizes user queries into actionable intents, sub-intents, and request types to improve resolution accuracy and NLP-driven automation.

services.title: Semantic Annotation and Entity Linking
services.desc: Semantic text annotation that links concepts, entities, and relationships across documents. Enables knowledge graph construction, semantic search, and advanced reasoning for AI and NLP systems.

video-annotation-services.desc: Expert labeling from object tracking to segmentation, delivering temporal consistency for accurate computer vision models.

services.title: 2D Bounding Box Video Annotation
services.desc: Precise localization of moving objects across frames for object detection and classification models. Accurately localizes vehicles, pedestrians, and assets across frames for scalable computer vision and autonomous systems.

services.title: Polygon and Polyline Video Annotation
services.desc: Fine-grained contouring of irregular shapes and linear structures for high-precision video analysis. Captures lanes, boundaries, and irregular shapes beyond bounding boxes for high-precision video analysis.

services.title: Semantic Segmentation Video Annotation
services.desc: Pixel-level classification of every frame for complete scene understanding and safety-critical AI. Assigns class labels to every frame for scene understanding, navigation, and safety-critical computer vision applications.

services.title: Keypoint and Landmark Video Annotation
services.desc: Skeletal tracking of joints and facial landmarks for precise motion analysis and biometrics. Tracks joints, facial landmarks, and gestures across video frames for AR, sports analytics, and biometrics.

services.title: LiDAR and 3D Point Cloud Video Annotation
services.desc: Synchronization of 3D sensor data with video feeds for depth perception and sensor fusion. Enables depth perception, spatial awareness, and sensor fusion for autonomous driving and robotics.

services.title: Video Object Tracking Annotation
services.desc: maintaining consistent object identities (ID) across frames despite occlusions or camera movement. Supports trajectory analysis, occlusion handling, and temporal continuity for surveillance and traffic intelligence.
